data.Summary:
Business and people-focused cybersecurity leader with 25+ years in technology and cybersecurity, including 15+ years in leadership roles managing teams of up to 200. Proven track record of delivering business-enabling security programs across various industries such as Federal Government, Local Government, SaaS startups, non-profits and with numerous clients spanning healthcare, financial, and technology sectors. Skilled in building technical security teams, client-facing services organizations, sales and engineering teams that drive revenue growth and create collaborative, consensus-driven cultures.

Active in the security community and advising security and privacy startups and enterprises.

Key Areas of Expertise:

- Security Programs: Board Reporting, Enterprise Security, Application/Product Security, Security Operations, Data Privacy, Identity & Access Management, Security M&A Due Diligence, Cloud Security, Threat Intelligence, Zero Trust, Data Loss Prevention, Detection Engineering and Response, Vulnerability Management, GRC, Data Governance, Employee Education, Enterprise Risk Management, Incident Response, Insider Threat, Policy Development, Election Security.

- Compliance: NIST CSF, ISO27001, SOC2 (Type I & II), CIS 8.0, GDPR, CPRA, HIPAA, HITRUST, Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX), GLBA Safeguards, PCI.

- Technology: On-prem, hybrid, multi-cloud, cloud-native, SaaS, PaaS, IaaS, AWS, GCP, Azure, Linux, Mac OS, Windows, Data Privacy Platforms, Firewalls, CSPM, SIEM, SOAR, EDR, IAM, DLP, ZTNA, CASB, PAM, Generative AI.
data.Title: Chief Information Security Officer

positions.Title: Chief Information Security Officer
positions.Description: Leadership of LevelBlue (a divested asset of AT&T) internal information security program, GRC, SecOps, and Enterprise IT organizations.

positions.Title: Member Board of Directors
positions.Description:
Corporate governance and oversight role with the world’s leading cybersecurity member association responsible for trusted industry certifications such as CISSP, CCSP, CGRC, and CC.  Serving three year term 2025-2027. 

Acting chair of by-laws committee and serve on the audit and risk committees.

positions.Title: Adjunct Professor
positions.Description: Part-time extended faculty position supporting the College of Technology’s cybersecurity program, reaching classes on Cloud Security and enterprise BC/DR.

positions.Title: Executive Director | General Manager | Security Consulting Services
positions.Description:
Senior leader of a cross-functional, global, cybersecurity services organization of 200 individuals, providing professionals services and consulting solutions to Fortune 500 firms, Federal, State, and Local Governments.  

Organizational revenue responsibility of $42M in Government (Federal, State, and Local) and $28M in the commercial segments.

Areas of Focus: InfoSec program development and management, risk advisory services, regulatory and compliance (PCI DSS, CMMC, HITRUST, NIST, ISO27K), network security engineering,  technology enablement, and security transformation.

positions.Title: Adjunct Professor
positions.Description: Inspiring others to join the field of cybersecurity.  Adjunct professor in graduate and undergraduate cyber studies program.

positions.Title: Regional Consulting Director
positions.Description: Leadership of a team of cybersecurity consultants in the Southwest U.S. with an enterprise cyber consulting business. Focused on solving complex challenges in information security, risk mitigation, compliance and regulatory assessments, and assistance in the implementation of frameworks (PCI, HITRUST, ISO, NIST, CIS). Program development, threat and vulnerability management solutions, incident response, ethical hacking, application security, program assessment and strategy development, election security, SOC operations, and secure infrastructure services.

positions.Title: Systems Engineering
positions.Description: Systems engineering for partner distribution channel for FireEye products and Mandiant consulting services

positions.Title: Regional Director, Industry & Mobility Applications Solutions

positions.Company: Broadview Networks, now part of Windstream
positions.Title: Senior Enterprise Solutions Manager
